metadata.description: Men may be flocking from all over Japan to try to steal a kiss from the wealthy young Benio, but she has the great ninja Tamaki there to protect her! The two of them don't always get along, but so far, everything has worked out one way or another. However, when Tamaki's ex shows up, trouble appears to be on the horizon. The lady and her ninja will get a lot closer in volume two!
metadata.name: A Springtime with Ninjas
